article_title: India's Defense Ministry Limiting Finmeccanica's Future Bid Ability
article_text:
NEW DELHI—India's Defense Ministry is imposing limits on Finmeccanica SpA's ability to bid on future weapons-supply deals, after Italian prosecutors leveled corruption charges against the Italian arms company and two of its former executives, an official said.

The official, who shared the contents of a memorandum outlining how the ministry should deal with Finmeccanica, said the company would be barred from competing for new...
